title: Zack Snyder's Justice League- Instant Reaction. Is it as philosophically rich as Batman v Superman
description:
Hey all,
Since my video exploring the theological and philosophical symbolism in #BatmanVSuperman is easily my most-watched and commented on video, I thought I'd offer some instant thoughts about Zack Snyder's Justice League which I just watched late last night.

I'm not a film reviewer, but I do care about exploring theology and philosophy in important works of popular culture.

These are some off the cuff, gut reactions I had to the movie. I may be right or wrong. Let me know what you think in the comments.


Here's the link to my Batman v Superman Video:
https://youtu.be/_eZkgte8Tx4

Luke Skywalker symbolism video:
https://youtu.be/_7ixhW_Ts7Y


#snydercut #snydercutreview #restorethesnyderverse
